contentList.content: Every turn, you restore 1 <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SorceryPoint">Sorcery Point</LSTag>.
Every turn, you restore 1 <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="KiPoint">Ki Point</LSTag>.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="WeaponProficiency">Weapon Proficiency</LSTag> with Simple Weapons.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="WeaponProficiency">Weapon Proficiency</LSTag> with Simple and Martial Weapons.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourProficiency">Armour Proficiency</LSTag> with Light Armour.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourProficiency">Armour Proficiency</LSTag> with Light and Medium Armour.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourProficiency">Armour Proficiency</LSTag> with Light, Medium, and Heavy Armour.

You add your Spellcasting Ability Modifier to your spell damage.

This does not stack with Agonizing Blast or Empowered Evocation.
When you deal spell damage, you can use your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SorceryPoint">Sorcery Points</LSTag> to deal maximum damage instead.
When you are Prone, standing up uses significantly less movement. Your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Jump">Jump</LSTag> distance also increases by 50%.
Add a bonus to your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag>.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> by 2, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> by 4, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> by 6, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> by 8, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> by 10, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> by 12, to a maximum of 30.
Add a bonus to your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag>.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> by 2, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> by 4, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> by 6, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> by 8, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> by 10, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> by 12, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> by 2, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> by 4, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> by 6, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> by 8, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> by 10, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> by 12, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> by 2, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> by 4, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> by 6, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> by 8, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> by 10, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> by 12, to a maximum of 30.
Add a bonus to your <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag>.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> by 2, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> by 4, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> by 6, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> by 8, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> by 10, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> by 12, to a maximum of 30.
Add a bonus to your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag>.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> by 2, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> by 4, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> by 6, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> by 8, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> by 10, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> by 12, to a maximum of 30.
Add a bonus to your <LSTag Tooltip="SkillCheck">Skill</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability</LSTag> checks.
No bonus to your <LSTag Tooltip="SkillCheck">Skill</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability</LSTag> checks.
Add 4 to your <LSTag Tooltip="SkillCheck">Skill</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability</LSTag> checks.
Add 8 to your <LSTag Tooltip="SkillCheck">Skill</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability</LSTag> checks.
Add 12 to your <LSTag Tooltip="SkillCheck">Skill</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability</LSTag> checks.
Add 16 to your <LSTag Tooltip="SkillCheck">Skill</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability</LSTag> checks.
Add 20 to your <LSTag Tooltip="SkillCheck">Skill</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability</LSTag> checks.

On selecting this training, you receive Archery and Sharpshooter.

At level 5, you receive Extra Attack, and Cunning Action: Dash.

At level 9, you receive Fast Hands, and Volley.

Finally, at level 11, you receive Improved Extra Attack.

At level 8, you receive <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Serenade_ProdigyAthleteFeat">Athlete</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Serenade_ProdigyMobileFeat">Mobile</LSTag>, and <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Tough">Tough</LSTag>.

On selecting this training, you receive Two-Weapon Fighting and Dual Wielder.

At level 5, you receive Extra Attack, and Cunning Action: Dash.

At level 9, you receive Fast Hands, and Whirlwind.

Finally, at level 11, you receive Improved Extra Attack.

On selecting this training, you receive Duelling, Protection, Defensive Duellist, and Shield Master.

At level 5, you receive Extra Attack, and Cunning Action: Dash.

At level 9, you receive Fast Hands, and Whirlwind.

Finally, at level 11, you receive Improved Extra Attack.

On selecting this training, you receive Great Weapon Fighting and Great Weapon Master.

At level 5, you receive Extra Attack, and Cunning Action: Dash.

At level 9, you receive Fast Hands, and Whirlwind.

Finally, at level 11, you receive Improved Extra Attack.

On selecting this training, you receive War Caster, and Proficiency on Constitution Saving Throws.

At level 4, you gain 5 Sorcery Points, Twinned Spell, and Restore Sorcery Points.

At level 7, you gain 5 additional Sorcery Points, Quickened Spell, and Empowered Magic.

At level 11, you gain a further 5 Sorcery Points, Heightened Spell, and Intensify Spell.

On selecting this training, you receive Bonus Unarmed Strike, Restore Ki Points, Tavern Brawler, and Step of the Wind: Dash. You also gain 2 Ki Points.

At level 5, you receive Extra Attack.

At level 7, you receive Fast Hands, Spinning Kick, and a further 2 Ki Points.

Finally, at level 11, you receive Improved Extra Attack, and 2 Ki Points.

At level 8, you receive <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="SavageAttacks">Savage Attacks</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="SavageAttacker">Savage Attacker</LSTag>, and <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="ImprovedCritical">Improved Critical Hit</LSTag>.
In addition to any <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slots</LSTag> that you gain from your class, each level you also gain the number of spell slots that a full spellcaster would have.

Taking this spell list grants Elemental Adept: Cold.

Gain the following spells at the appropriate level: Ray of Frost, Armour of Agathys, Create or Destroy Water, Fog Cloud, Ice Knife, Gust of Wind, Hunger of Hadar, Sleet Storm, Ice Storm, Cone of Cold, Otiluke's Freezing Sphere, and Wall of Ice.

Gain the following spells at the appropriate level: <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_BladeWard">Blade Ward</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Resistance">Resistance</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_ArmorOfAgathys">Armour of Agathys</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_HealingWord">Healing Word</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_ProtectionFromEvilAndGood">Protection from Evil and Good</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Shield_Wizard">Shield</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_MirrorImage">Mirror Image</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Counterspell">Counterspell</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_FireShield">Fire Shield</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_DispelEvilAndGood">Dispell Evil and Good</LSTag>, and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_GlobeOfInvulnerability">Globe of Invulnerability</LSTag>.

Taking this spell list grants Elemental Adept: Fire.

Gain the following spells at the appropriate level: Fire Bolt, Produce Flame, Burning Hands, Grease, Hellish Rebuke, Searing Smite, Flame Blade, Flaming Sphere, Scorching Ray, Fireball, Fire Shield, Wall of Fire, and Flame Strike.

Gain the following spells at the appropriate level: <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Jump">Enhance Leap</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_ExpeditiousRetreat">Expeditious Retreat</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_FeatherFall">Feather Fall</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Longstrider">Longstrider</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_MistyStep">Misty Step</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_GaseousForm">Gaseous Form</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Fly">Grant Flight</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Teleportation_DimensionDoor">Dimension Door</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_FreedomOfMovement">Freedom of Movement</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly">Fly</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Teleportation_ArcaneGate">Arcane Gate</LSTag>, and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_WindWalk">Wind Walk</LSTag>.

Gain the following spells at the appropriate level: <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_ChillTouch">Bone Chill</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_EldritchBlast">Eldritch Blast</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_ArmorOfAgathys">Armour of Agathys</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_ArmsOfHadar">Arms of Hadar</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_InflictWounds">Inflict Wounds</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_RayOfSickness">Ray of Sickness</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Blindness">Blindness</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_AnimateDead">Animate Dead</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_SpeakWithDead">Speak with Dead</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_VampiricTouch">Vampiric Touch</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Blight">Blight</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Contagion">Contagion</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_CircleOfDeath">Circle of Death</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_CreateUndead">Create Undead</LSTag>, and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Harm">Harm</LSTag>.

Taking this spell list grants Elemental Adept: Lightning, and Elemental Adept: Thunder.

Gain the following spells at the appropriate level: Storm Bolt, Shocking Grasp, Chromatic Orb, Create or Destroy Water, Thunderous Smite, Thunderwave, Shatter, Lightning Bolt, Destructive Wave, and Chain Lightning.

Taking this spell list grants Devil's Sight.

Gain the following spells at the appropriate level: Mage Hand, Minor Illusion, Disguise Self, Darkness, Invisibility, Pass Without Trace, See Invisibility, Feign Death, Greater Invisibility, and Seeming.
